'''5th Birthday Skin Pack''' is a [[skin pack]] that includes 28 skins, 25 of which depicting developers at [[4J Studios]]. It was available from May 9 to May 21, 2017 for {{editions|xb360|xbone}}, celebrating the fifth anniversary of ''Xbox 360 Edition''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s release.<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|861868357116710912|To celebrate the 5th Birthday on Xbox, there's a FREE Minecraft 5th Birthday Skin Pack out now on Xbox 360 and Xbox One.}}</ref>

Beginning December 19, 2017, this skin pack was released for a limited time on {{editions|ps3|ps4|psvita}} as the '''4th Birthday Skin Pack''',<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|943043232807632899|Happy 4th Birthday Minecraft: PlayStation Editions!<br>The free 4th Birthday Skin Pack (and the 1st, 2nd & 3rd Birthday Skin Packs) will be available today for Sony consoles!}}</ref> and on {{editions|wiiu|switch}} as the '''2nd Birthday Skin Pack'''.<ref>{{Tweet|4JStudios|943043476815429632|Happy 2nd Birthday Minecraft: Nintendo Editions!<br>The free 2nd Birthday Skin Pack (and 1st Birthday Skin Pack) will be available later today/early tomorrow for Nintendo Switch & Nintendo Wii U!}}</ref>

Due to the [[Better Together Update]], it was added {{in|be}} on September 12, 2017, although it is only available to players who owned it already when they migrated from Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|September 21, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref>

This skin pack is available to claim on [https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/minecraft-5th-birthday-skin-pack/9NDQ1ZT0KWM1 Xbox.com]
